product_name: GNU Smart Pickle PBTX Snowboard - Women's - 2014/2015
long_description: Offering balance through asymmetry, the women's GNU Smart Pickle PBTX Snowboard has an asymmetric design that matches the mechanics of toe- and heel-side turns for easy, intuitive control on the hill.
short_description: Offering balance through asymmetry, the women's GNU Smart Pickle PBTX Snowboard has an asymmetric design that matches the mechanics of toe- and heel-side turns for easy, intuitive control on the hill.
